Music Player

About this project

This is a Music Player project in JavaScript using the audio API's play, pause methods, and time update event. When users push the play button the image is going to rotate like a record. Also, the title of the song and a progress bar will pop up. Users can pause and skip around the progress by clicking anywhere on the bar. Three songs are provided, so users can change it forward, and backward.
